otherReasons.title: Do you need to upload any other documents?
otherReasons.extraDocuments: You should only do this if you have acquired new documents since you first applied which are relevant to your application.

clarification.title: Do you want to submit additional documents?
clarification.extraDocs: You must submit the documents requested by the court. You can also submit additional documents to support your response.

adultery.title: Do you need to upload evidence of the adultery?
adultery.adulteryDoc: You should only do this if your {{ divorceWho }} hasn’t admitted to committing adultery.
adultery.extraDocs: You can also upload any new documents you’ve acquired since you first applied which are relevant to your application.

errors.required: Select Yes if you want to share any other documents with the court

upload.title: Do you need to upload any other documents?

otherReasons.title: Ydych chi angen uwchlwytho unrhyw ddogfennau eraill?
otherReasons.extraDocuments: Dylech ond wneud hyn os ydych wedi cael dogfennau eraill sy’n berthnasol i’ch cais ers ichi gyflwyno’ch cais i ddechrau.

clarification.title: Ydych chi eisiau cyflwyno dogfennau ychwanegol?
clarification.extraDocs: Mae rhaid ichi gyflwyno’r dogfennau y gofynnwyd amdanynt gan y llys.  Gallwch hefyd gyflwyno dogfennau ychwanegol i gefnogi eich ymateb.

adultery.title: Ydych chi angen uwchlwytho tystiolaeth am yr odineb?
adultery.adulteryDoc: Dylech ond wneud hyn os nad yw eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi cyfaddef eu bod wedi cyflawni godineb.
adultery.extraDocs: Gallwch hefyd uwchlwytho unrhyw ddogfennau eraill rydych wedi’u cael sy’n berthnasol i’ch cais ers ichi gyflwyno’ch cais i ddechrau.

errors.required: Dewiswch ‘Ydw’ os ydych eisiau rhannu unrhyw ddogfennau eraill gyda’r llys

upload.title: Ydych chi angen uwchlwytho unrhyw ddogfennau eraill?
